settings.label: Page Width
settings.info: The default is full width (100%), and that's for all content.

settings.label: Padding
settings.info: These are container paddings for all content.

settings.label: Margin
settings.info: These are section spaces for all content.

settings.label: Large
settings.info: This is Large width, by default it is 1440px and you can use it in the custom settings section.

settings.label: Medium
settings.info: This is Medium width, by default it is 1024px and you can use it in the custom settings section.

settings.label: Small
settings.info: This is Small width, by default it is 960px and you can use it in the custom settings section.

settings.label: Custom Font
settings.info: Please enter your custom font css here and use font name `heading-font` example: @font-face{font-family:'heading-font', ... and etc.}

settings.label: Custom Font
settings.info: Please enter your custom font css here and use font name `title-font` example: @font-face{font-family:'title-font', ... and etc.}

settings.label: Custom Font
settings.info: Please enter your custom font css here and use font name `sub-title-font` example: @font-face{font-family:'sub-title-font', ... and etc.}

settings.label: Custom Font
settings.info: Please enter your custom font css here and use font name `body-font` example: @font-face{font-family:'body-font', ... and etc.}

settings.label: Custom Font
settings.info: Please enter your custom font css here and use font name `button-font` example: @font-face{font-family:'button-font', ... and etc.}

settings.label: Custom Font
settings.info: Please enter your custom font css here and use font name `navigation-font` example: @font-face{font-family:'navigation-font', ... and etc.}

settings.label: Custom Font
settings.info: Please enter your custom font css here and use font name `field-font` example: @font-face{font-family:'field-font', ... and etc.}

settings.label: Discount Percent (%) For All Products Prices
Collections to exclude on Discount
settings.info: Use '|' to seperate Collection. EX: 3 PIECE SWIM|Viviane's Faves

settings.label: Checkout Button Position
settings.info: This option will work for only Cart style 1

settings.label: Cart Modal Layout
settings.info: This option will work for only Cart style 2

settings.label: Which currencies to show free shipping banner
Free Shipping Text
settings.info: Please select ONLY PRICE and add the STRONG (BOLD) style

settings.label: Enable Once
settings.info: Whether animation should happen only once - while scrolling down

settings.label: Anchor placements
settings.info: Defines which position of the element regarding to window should trigger the animation
